word_mean: 免疫抑制：人工防止或减弱免疫应答，如可用照射，抗代谢药，抗淋巴细胞血清或特异性抗体防止或减弱免疫应答

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: Cyclophosphamide may causes immunosuppression through the induction of apoptosis of thymocyte.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 环磷酰胺的免疫抑制作用可能是通过诱导免疫细胞凋亡而产生的.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion 1 . FK 506 + MMF and FK 506 + MMF + Pred both could provide effective immunosuppression.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论1.FK506+MMF和FK506+MMF+Pred均有很强的免疫抑制效应.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the CRF mediated immunomodulation role in cadmium immunosuppression in vitro.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的　探讨体外镉的免疫功能抑制过程中促肾上腺皮质激素释放因子(CRF)的修饰调节作用.

means.word_mean: 1. lowering the body's normal immune response to invasion by foreign substances; can be deliberate (as in lowering the immune response to prevent rejection of a transplanted organ) or incidental (as a side effect of radiotherapy or chemotherapy for cancer)
